mapper.sql: select g.id, g.name, g.avatar, g.description, g.owner_id, g.max_members, g.all_muted, g.is_deleted, g.deleted_time, g.create_time, g.update_time, u.username as owner_name, (select count(*) from im_group_member where group_id = g.id and is_deleted = 0) as member_count from im_group g left join im_user u on g.owner_id = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into im_group (name, avatar, description, owner_id, max_members, all_muted, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{avatar}, #{description}, #{ownerId}, 500, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: update im_group set is_deleted = 1, deleted_time = NOW() where id = #{id}

update im_group set is_deleted = 1, deleted_time = NOW() where id in
#{id}
update im_group set is_deleted = 1, deleted_time = NOW() where id = #{groupId}
update im_group_member set is_deleted = 1, deleted_time = NOW() where group_id = #{groupId} and user_id = #{userId}
update im_group_member set role = #{role}, update_time = NOW() where group_id = #{groupId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from im_group where is_deleted = 0
select count(*) from im_group where is_deleted = 0 and DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
select count(*) from im_group_member where is_deleted = 0
select count(distinct g.id) from im_group g inner join im_conversation c on c.target_id = g.id and c.type = 'GROUP' where g.is_deleted = 0 and c.last_message_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
select count(*) from im_group where is_deleted = 0 and all_muted = 1
select count(*) from im_group g where g.is_deleted = 0 and (select count(*) from im_group_member where group_id = g.id and is_deleted = 0) > 100

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM im_group WHERE is_deleted = 0) as totalCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM im_group WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND all_muted = 1) as mutedCount, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) FROM im_group g INNER JOIN im_conversation c ON c.target_id = g.id AND c.type = 'GROUP' WHERE g.is_deleted = 0 AND c.last_message_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) as activeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT group_id FROM im_group_member WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY group_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100) t) as largeCount
